Package casino.gamingmachine

Interface IGamingMachine

All Known Implementing Classes:
GamingMachine
public interface IGamingMachine
Described a gaming machine. a machine has a gamingmachineID, is always connected to a game and the cashier. one card can be connected or disconnected to a machine.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void acceptWinner​(BetResult winResult)
    Accept the BetResult from the winner.
    void connectCard​(IGamblerCard card)
    connect card to this gaming machine
    void disconnectCard()
    disconnects/removes card from this gaming machine.
    GamingMachineID getGamingMachineID()
    getter
    boolean placeBet​(long amountInCents)
    try to place bet with given amount and connected card.

  • Method Details

    • placeBet

      boolean placeBet​(long amountInCents) throws NoPlayerCardException
      try to place bet with given amount and connected card. amount needs to be checked with the cashier if accepted: generate a bet using the card and add it to the game.
      Parameters:
      amountInCents - amount in cents to gamble
      Returns:
      true if bet is valid, excepted and added to betting round.
      Throws:
      NoPlayerCardException - when no card is connected to this machine.

    • acceptWinner

      void acceptWinner​(BetResult winResult)
      Accept the BetResult from the winner. Clear all open bets on this machine. When the winner has made his bet on this machine: let the Cashier update the amount of the winner.
      Parameters:
      winResult - result of a betting round. can be null when there is no winner.

    • getGamingMachineID

      GamingMachineID getGamingMachineID()
      getter
      Returns:
      gamingmachineID

    • connectCard

      void connectCard​(IGamblerCard card)
      connect card to this gaming machine
      Parameters:
      card - card to connect

    • disconnectCard

      void disconnectCard() throws CurrentBetMadeException
      disconnects/removes card from this gaming machine.
      Throws:
      CurrentBetMadeException - when open bets made with this card are still present in the current betting round and
